parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
